name: Red Shirts
description:
Created as part of a weekly game design task during a game design module of a master's degree course. The task was to find an image or video online and use that as a theme to create a game. I saw an image from Star Trek in which Captain Kirk is helped by a group of red shirted security officers and so I tried to make a game based around that idea.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move [player can't move diagonally]

Spacebar - Fire [forward from the player's weapon hand]

Control - Deploy a red shirt [red shirt will then 'attack' a nearby enemy]

Created in Clickteam Fusion 2.5
